title: The Overlook Effect
description:
reference: viXra:2211.0002v1
title: The Overlook Effect
authors: Clark M. Thomas
category: General Science and Philosophy
type: submission
date: 2022-11-01 00:44:15
abstract: Humans typically envision things parallel to wherethey are standing on the Earth. The overlook effect(OE) seems to be something out of the emergingspace age. However, it has been around as long asproto-humans first lived in trees. The OE is a keyaspect of general relativity, not related to speciousGeneral Relativity. Our survival depends partly onunderstanding the real OE in our modern world.
